text: Kishori Pednekar (IAST:Kiśōrī Pēḍaṇēkara) (born 25 December 1962) is an Indian politician. She is the current Mayor of Mumbai since 2019. She worked as a nurse earlier on and once again in 2020, this time to motivate other healthcare workers during COVID-19 pandemic in India. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Indian mayors Category:Politicians from Mumbai
title: Kishori Pednekar
